nodes.text: Trax Bonkik was the younger brother of the Rodian Pax Bonkik. He and his brother eventually became slaves of Mars Guo, and were frequently forced to work on his podracer, but when Guo was injured in the Boonta Eve Classic, he was forced to sell the brothers and Sebulba bought Trax. Pax was freed by slavery critic Teemto Pagalies, who later bought Trax back, and the brothers were reunited.
